abstrac: Professional Web Designer and Wordpress Developer
bio:
Hello,
My name is Faysal Hossin, I am a Bangladesh based freelance website designer. I am Hardworking person and have the ability to perform various tasks independently.

I believe in quality of work, Because Here the business only based on faith without checking provider and contractor's actual background, So I would like to make this business fair and better, where provider can earn long time and client will get good quality/ Quantity products faster in less price.


I can do the following with trustworthiness:

Web Design ( HTML & CSS )::
(i) PSD TO HTML
(ii) Responsive Design/ Mobile support Design/Mobile Friendly Design
(iii) Landing Page Creation
(iv) E-mail Template Creation and Mailchimp
(v) Twitter Bootstrap
(vi) UI kit, Parallax, Less CSS and  jQuery Plugin

CMS (WordPress, Joomla)::
(i) PSD TO WordPress
(ii) From any site to Convert Wordpress
(iii) Wordpress Website Creation
(iii) Wordpress Premium Theme Development and Theme Customization
(iv) Wordpress Child Theme
(v) Option Tree and Options Framework
(iii) WordPress PlugIn Development
(iv) Transfer existing Wordpress site from one domain to another


E-commerce Site::
(i) OpenCart
(ii) Woo Commerce
(ii) PrestaShop

This is my portfolio site: www.fhinvention.com
I always prefer this by all trams of guru.

description.title: Network Administration
description: We have been into managing and deploying the data center operation including servers, networking (Cisco, Nortel,vyatta, mikrotik and juniper), VOIP Solutions using (Asterisk, switchvox, trixbox and fr…

abstrac: Expert in IT infra projects Includes administration, deployment and management of Servers of mixed environment, Routers, Firewall, Data Centre Operation and VOIP Setup
bio:
Dear Sir/Madam,

We have over a 12 years of experience in administration, management of heterogenious IT Infra setup which includes servers(Linux, Solaris, Windows), networking (Cisco, Nortel,vyatta, mikrotik and juniper), VOIP Solutions using (Asterisk, switchvox, trixbox and freeswitch), Cloud Virtual Hosting, Data Centre Operation and web hosting solutions.

Some of the projects handled by us include the following technologies:

1. Storage solutions using opensource (GFS SAN)
2. Backup solutions based on opensource (incld. setup of VTL's)
3. IPsec peer to peer VPN setups of 30 sites.
4. Management and deployment of routers and appliance based firewalls.
5. User authenticated FTP Server setup on windows and Linux.
6. Samba Server Setup with access control.
7. Mail Server (Qmail, Postfix,sendmail, exchange) Setup and Administration.
8. Cisco Firewall ASA(55xx) failover setup 
9. Vyatta Router setup for routing , firewall and VPN
10. Asterisk, trixbox and freeswitch setup and customization.
11. Windows 2k8 AD, Exchange, Clustering, and Hyper-V setup.
12. Network/resource  monitoring using open source nagios, opennms, cacti and zenoss, 
13. Network Security Assessment and its remedial action.
14. Providing Open Source Solution as per requirement
15. AWS migration from bare metal and virtual paltform.
16. Xenserver/Citrix/VMWare vSphere/VDI setup and its implementation.

I  can assure successful completion of the mentioned project if our proposal is accepted. I have strong reason to say that i can be good fit for job as i have vast experience on various platform and good understanding of servers, open source projects, router and security implementation.
My hourly rate would be 25$ for the said project.

Looking forward to receive favourable response from your end.

Should you have any query/clarification, you may please revert as per my contact details  given below.

skype: jp.yadav1
email:jagdish@itinforealm.com
Mob: +919919764379

Thanks and regards,
Jagdish
